content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius city district court the case involved a married couple referred to as an and vn who were seeking the division of their joint property after their marriage was dissolved the court has found that there is joint ownership of an immovable property and a ford galaxy vehicle which was acquired during the marriage the applicant an requested that the vehicle be awarded to the defendant vn as personal property without any monetary compensation the court has considered the evidence and decided in favor of the applicant awarding the vehicle to vn as personal property without financial compensation to an the court has also noted the existence of joint creditors liabilities acquired during the marriage the costs of the proceedings will be borne by the applicant and the defendant is required to reimburse the applicant for their costs the defendant is also ordered to pay court fees to the state budget the court has dissolved the marriage between an and vn

metadata.cost: 17.92 EUR (court fees) + 126.00 EUR (professional fees) to be borne by the defendant
